item.title: 4 hours after the area being cleared, more bags dumped, 7th September
item.description:
The clothing bin is (as usual) full so bags have been dumped on the street . Very unfortunate as a clear up was done this morning and by early afternoon, more was dumped . Seems this location attracts this despite the negative impact on local residents

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Webber Street, Southwark, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Faded street name plate, 7th September
item.description:
Pickford Road name plate/sign, on the side nearest the Broadway end, is faded to the extent that it is not able to identify the name of the road for pedestrians and car drivers. Please would you consider replacing? Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Road, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish & 'donations', 7th September
item.description:
There is a black bag next to the litter bin by the bus stop. There is also a lot of bags and items (donations?) in and around the doorway of the Animal Charity CIC on Pickford Lane, behind the bus stop.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pickford Lane, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Someone has sip-tied a flag to the lamppost right outside my house , obstructing my view from my property., 7th September
item.description:
Without authorisation, someone has used plastic sip-ties to mount a flag on the public lamppost outside of my driveway. It does not look like it is safely secured as the plastic ties seem to be pushed through the fabric of the flag itself and maybe in danger of ripping and coming loose due to the force of the wind. This, in turn. poses a risk to the traffic on my road. The flag is quite large and also obstructs my view from my house. It needs to be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Erith Road, Barnehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lighting in Court Downs Road, 7th September
item.description:
FixMyStreet ref: 8124768 already report - this is an update At approximately 20.30 hours tonight (07.09.25) the street lights weren't working but they were illuminated by approximately 22.00 hours so presumably the timing is not working.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Court Downs Road, Beckenham, London

item.title: Croxted Road SE21 a few yards from streetlight column ID number 423 # 24, 7th September
item.description:
Croxted Road SE21 a few yards from streetlight column ID number 423 # 24 (ie just south of Dalkeith Road junction – by house number 175) plastic coated green metal bicycle locker graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 187,189, Croxted Road, Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet
